original: DJURBERG, Gösta Stensson, Disponent, Karlstad, f Lovö, Sthlms län, 11/7 97 av öv.-löjtn Sten D o Selma Thimgren, gm Lilly Boman. Studex, SKHS (forstm). Anst Sv järnbr träkolsfrn 26—28, Billeruds AB 2&—38, sed. 38 h Wermländska Inmätn.frn (gr 09, opart org f mätn av västsv skogsprodukt), länsskogsbrandch Värml län, led kristidsstyr bränsledeleg, sekr Virkesmätn.rådet. Av trycket : Tabeller f volymberäkn av träkol (1. uppl 26, 2. uppl 41), upps i facktidskr. Rotary.
translated: DJURBERG, Gösta Stensson, Manager, Karlstad, b. Lovö, Stockholm County, 11/7 1897, son of Lieutenant Sten D and Selma Thimgren, m. Lilly Boman. Graduated from SKHS (Forestry). Employed at Swedish iron and charcoal company from 1926-1928, Billeruds AB from 1928-1938, and currently working at Wermländska Inmätningsföreningen (founded in 1909, non-partisan organization for forest product measurement in western Sweden). Also served in the County Forest Fire Brigade of Värmland County, and was a member of the fuel allocation emergency force. Secretary of the Timber Measurement Council. Publications include: Tables for volume calculation of charcoal (1st edition published in 1926, 2nd edition in 1941), published in professional journals. Member of Rotary.
